title: Akhmatova Requiem, Six Russian Folk Songs [FLAC+MP3](Big Papi)
description:
Source: CD + Fresh Cover Art Scan

[i]This is simply beautiful and reaches into the soul. 

Is it too Hannibal Lector of me to want to kill the coughing guy in the audience? He should have excused himself.

It's too late now but Big Papi should have made this compilation gapless playback so each track seamlessly moves into the next.  Your player maybe allow you to make that setting and it is highly recommended to do so.

Somewhat of a rare CD from the BBC Sound Archive. Recorded live August 1981, Promenade Concert, Royal Albert Hall. Compact Disc is dated 1997.

- Big Papi[/i]


[img]http://image.bayimg.com/9cf7fce2ffb51198b2427382de4836c5a2cd7adc.jpg[/img]
